text: Clifton Reginald Wharton Jr. (September 13, 1926 - November 17, 2024) was an American university president, corporate executive and former United States Deputy Secretary of State Wharton Jr. died from cancer in New York City on November 16, 2024, at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2024 deaths Category:United States Deputy Secretaries of State Category:Politicians from Boston Category:Politicians from Chicago
title: Clifton R. Wharton Jr.
